articles.title: Mickey Gilley, Who Helped Inspire 'Urban Cowboy,' Dies At 86 - HuffPost
articles.description: He received six Academy of Country Music Awards, and occasionally worked as an actor, with appearances on “Murder She Wrote,” “The Fall Guy" and “The Dukes of Hazzard.”
articles.content:
Country star Mickey Gilley, whose namesake Texas honky-tonk inspired the 1980 film Urban Cowboy and a nationwide wave of Western-themed nightspots, has died. He was 86.
